actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of additional compensation at the so-called "K rate" to a veteran with a service-connected disability who has suffered the loss or loss of use of one lung or one kidney.

summary.text: Provides monthly veterans' disability compensation for veterans who, as the result of a service-connected disability, have suffered the loss, or loss of use, of a lung or kidney.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the payment of additional compensation at the so-called "K rate" to a veteran with a service-connected disability who has suffered the loss or loss of use of one lung or one kidney.
